description:
Extend your ride. Built on a light and rigid C2 aluminum frame, the Synapse 105 handles beautifully. Outfitted with Shimano’s 105 drivetrain, you get to experience high-end performance without breaking the bank. Using the compact version of the 105 brifters, gear shifts and brake control is comfortably within reach, even for those with smaller hands. Whether you’re a competitive rider looking for a training rig, or a burgeoning roadie searching for an all-round performer, this Synapse will have you smiling.

  • Smartform C2 alloy frame and carbon fork, with aggressive road bike geometry
  • SAVE™ Micro-suspension uses strategically engineered flex zones in the rear triangle to smooth out the ride
  • Shimano 105 groupset with FSA Gossamer cranks
  • Compact brifters designed specifically for smaller hands
  • TRP Spyre-C mechanical disc brakes offer plenty of stopping power
  • 2x11 drive train pairs 50-34T chain rings with an 11-34T cassette
  • Vittoria Zaffiro tires are grippy and have low rolling resistance
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Synapse 105 Bicycle - Women's

specs.value: Cannondale Grip Bar Tape w/ gel
